description: Currently, those living with a person who has recently come to the island do not need to isolate.
title: Whole households must self-isolate after off-island travel
title_page: Whole households must self-isolate after off-island travel - BBC News
maintext: There have been four new cases of coronavirus on the Isle of Man in the last two days, which are linked to contact with a person who had recently travelled off the island.
